turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, thanks for asking. how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a caramel macchiato from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which starbucks did you want to pickup from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the one on Newport on west coast highway and Riverside.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I want like a venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what kind of milk did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So I have a vente caramel macchiatto with soy milk from the starbucks off of west coast highway and riverside

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, you're all set, the order will be ready for pickup in 15 minutes and you'll get your reciept via mobile.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem, have a good one!
